thread.title: Flavio Garcia De Alba
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Flavio Garcia De Alba

author: Flavio Garcia De Alba
title: Flavio Garcia De Alba
text: I went through 4 different lenders before I got to quicken loans. We were almost done with all the paper work and then no more calls or answers. Then I tried quicken loans. From the first call to the vary last call. They were in communication with me almost everyday via email or phone calls. They made the process very easy. I will definitely use them again in the near future and I already recommended 2 of my family members and they are starting their process as well
